last_episode_to_air.name: Last Will Be First
last_episode_to_air.overview: Janice and her children discover their purpose.

name: Terror Lake Drive
overview: A single mother tries to dodge her troubled past by relocating to another city with her defiant teenager, only to discover there are forces that cannot be outrun.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the midst of a recent pandemic and calls for social distancing, a single mother sets her sights on starting a new life and relocates to Atlanta, but quickly discovers she can't outrun her past and a love gone wrong.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In the second installment of the anthology series Terror Lake Drive, a traveling nurse, bohemian doula, disgruntled detective and a disgraced mayor all collide and come face to face with the mystical grounds known as Freeman Lakes Apartments.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In the third installment of the anthology series Terror Lake Drive, a Georgia family mysteriously inherits a luxury property home on Lake Levi, the grounds previously known as (the haunted) Freeman Lakes.

tagline: Sometimes your past is right in front of you.

episodes.name: Leap
episodes.overview: A mother and son leave their matriarch's nest and relocate to Atlanta for a fresh start.

episodes.name: Murphy's Law
episodes.overview: Sam and AJ settle into their new life and apartment but quickly realize that there's more to Freeman Lakes than meets the eye.

episodes.name: True Romance
episodes.overview: Sam finds herself amidst a burgeoning romance with Corey. AJ gets a visitor at school. Secrets about AJ and Corey are revealed

episodes.name: Something About AJ
episodes.overview: AJ starts exuding some odd behavior as he protests to go back to Baltimore. Mounting inconsistencies emerge about Corey that leaves Sam in doubt.

episodes.name: No Stalker Sh*t
episodes.overview: Much to his dismay, Sam asks Corey for some breathing room as he becomes the center of attention in an investigation at Freeman Lake Apartments.

episodes.name: T.H.U.G.
episodes.overview: Suppressed emotions unleash and things come to a boil as revelations unravel in the season finale.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In the midst of a recent pandemic and calls for social distancing, a single mother sets her sights on starting a new life and relocates to Atlanta, but quickly discovers she can't outrun her past and a love gone wrong.

episodes.name: Deja Vu/Already Done
episodes.overview: A traveling nurse takes an assignment in Atlanta and responds to an ad seeking a roommate at the ominous Freeman Lake Apartments.

episodes.name: Reve/These Dreams
episodes.overview: Deja becomes more acquainted with Shana and adjusts to her new assignment and residence. A familiar face returns to Freeman Lakes.

episodes.name: Menage A Trois/Entanglement
episodes.overview: A string of abductions launches a new investigation and puts the city's mayor in the hot seat. Deja clashes with Shana and begins to notice some peculiar behavior. Theories arise about a possible suspect with the recent disappearance.

episodes.name: Qu'est/Who Is It?
episodes.overview: The BFM family is dealt a lethal blow. Desmond takes lead in an investigation. The mayor prepares for the impending riots.

episodes.name: Au Revior/Get Out
episodes.overview: The hidden secrets of Freeman Lakes come to the surface. Shana forms an unlikely alliance. Nefertiti assumes a new role. Deja meets the men of her dreams.

episodes.name: Exode/Exodus
episodes.overview: Deja goes home and discovers her roots. Freeman Lakes is no more.

episodes.name: C'est La Guerre/This Means War
episodes.overview: A showdown falls on the grounds formerly known as Freeman Lakes.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In the second installment of the anthology series Terror Lake Drive, a traveling nurse, bohemian doula, disgruntled detective and a disgraced mayor all collide and come face to face with the mystical grounds known as Freeman Lakes Apartments.

episodes.name: The Purge
episodes.overview: In the third installment of the Anthology series Terror Lake Drive, a Georgia family mysteriously inherits a luxury property home on Lake Levi, the grounds previously known as (the haunted) Freeman Lakes.

episodes.name: Get Out
episodes.overview: The Duvernay family arrives at Lake Levi; Janice gets a history lesson about the resort's troubled past.

episodes.name: Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Janice meets a familiar ally; Chee Chee goes missing; Jacob is summoned.

episodes.name: Marshall's Law
episodes.overview: Lake Levi goes into lockdown.

episodes.name: Don't Kill the Messenger
episodes.overview: Hendrix lands himself in huge trouble; Sarah tries to aid a friend; Infant Medium gets woke; Thaddeus makes a sacrificial play.

episodes.name: Ben
episodes.overview: We catch a glimpse into Ben's childhood; divisions arise among the Duvernay family members; Janice is advised to flee Lake Levi.

episodes.name: Last Will Be First
episodes.overview: Janice and her children discover their purpose.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In the third installment of the anthology series Terror Lake Drive, a Georgia family mysteriously inherits a luxury property home on Lake Levi, the grounds previously known as (the haunted) Freeman Lakes.
